thread.title: April Bainton
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da April Bainton

author: April Bainton
title: April Bainton
text: The product is perfect and was delivered very quickly considering it came from Italy and I live in Australia. However the box it came in was not adequate, it was crushed and the foam pieces were loose in the satchel. Somehow my glasses were unaffected by this, bit it could have resulted in a broken product.
